Concept Name: bike sharing based off of linka
Description: linka lock immobilizes bike preventing it from being ridden counts on the uniqueness of the bike and gps tracking to prevent it from being stolen and ridden
when cut releases a bright flash that temporarily blinds thief it also texts you this gives you time to make it to thief and prevent theft
this is a cheap 20 version of linka made of rubber it moves into place when ulock is improperly removed preventing bike mobilization long enough for you to reach your bike and prevent thief
when lock is cut it shocks and burns thief this makes it less desirable for thief to cut

brakes engage at the press of a button on a phoneapp this forces the thief to either dismantle the brakes giving you time to intervene or they have to carry bike rather than ride it which slows their theft down
sharing alarmed lock so that the owner of the lock a company will be notified when a bike is being stolen more shareholders involved
the same concept of bitlock using cheaper material loud alarm to tell people that something is being stolen to make the thief afraid
using car key to unlock the bike lock give the same alarm as car when thief is trying to steal the bike or even the wheels
when thief is trying to forcefully unlock the lock a glue will come out and stick with the thiefs hand and the owner will be notified
using magnet to unlock the wheel to the frame so that it is unbreakable magnet is not easily breakable
when the bike is stolen a lock can be activated so that the bike cant be turned to right or left

when the bike is stolen and the wheel is rolling owner will be notified and the tire will be deflated this will make the thief fall down from the bike and owner will have more time to get the bike back

when the bike is stolen and the wheel is rolling owner will be notified and the pedal will be stopped this will make the thief fall down from the bike and owner will have more time to get the bike back
when the bike is stolen the pedal will spin continuously making it disturbing for the thief to take the bike away
this will notify all bike app owners in the nearby area when a bike is stolen so more people is notified and they can help each other
